sentence.Network_en: She reworked a lot of her compositions to make them more danceable.
sentence.Network_cn: 她改编了自己的很多乐曲，使其更适合作舞曲。

sentence.Network_en: The emphasis on percussion and Cuban rhythms make the style quite danceable and accessible.
sentence.Network_cn: 原因很简单:它对于打击乐器和古巴旋律的偏重,使得这一音乐形式相当合适跳舞,且易于理解.
